text: obata mehi kara nodun sæpa pahasukam siyalla niyata vasayenma api (ehidi) ovunta sapaya di tibunemu. tavada api ovunta savanada (dunnemu). æsda (dunnemu. sita bæliya hæki) hrdayada dunnemu. ehet ovun allahge ayavan pratiksepa kirime hetuven ovunge kanda, ovunge æsda, ovunge hrdayanda, ovunta kisima prayojanayak at kara dunne næta. (danduvama gæna) ovun samaccal karamin sitimama ovunva vata kara gatteya
